name: df-toset
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4
body: |- wceq(ctos, crab(s0, cpo, wsbc(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wsbc(s2, cfv(cple, cv(s0)), wral(s3, cv(s1), wral(s4, cv(s1), wo(wbr(cv(s3), cv(s2), cv(s4)), wbr(cv(s4), cv(s2), cv(s3)))))))))
comment: Define the class of totally ordered sets (tosets). (Contributed by FL, 17-Nov-2014.)
